mapper.insert: insert into savedword(wordId, word, mean, wordcount, userId) values (#{wordId}, #{word}, #{mean}, 0, #{userId})
mapper.select: select * from savedword where userId = #{userId} and appearanceDate <= current_timestamp and isNewcard = false and isWrongcard = false and isReviewCard = true LIMIT 1

and isNewcard = false and isWrongcard = true and isReviewCard = true
ORDER BY savedDate LIMIT 1

select count(*) from savedword where userId = #{userId} and isNewCard = true and isWrongcard = false and isReviewCard = false
